definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Cor Anglais belongs to woodwind section.
The top of the funnel is connected to a tube.
sentences.chinese: 通过杯状或漏斗状吹口吹奏的铜管乐器。

sentences.english: "Wu-er" is a pipe musical instrument of the Wa nationality used at the funerals.
sentences.chinese: “兀儿”是佤族在丧葬仪式中使用的一种吹管乐器。

sentences.english: Originally, flute is belong to woodwind, later made by metal.
sentences.chinese: 长笛原来属于木管乐器，后来改用金属制造。

sentences.english: Since then, we’ve learned to created wind instruments, and those with strings.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起，我们学会了创造管乐器和弦乐器。

sentences.english: He won first prize in the woodwind section.
sentences.chinese: 他获得木管乐器组一等奖。

sentences.english: He plays the pipe in the orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 他在交响乐团演奏管乐器。

sentences.english: An organ stop that produces a tone like that of the brass wind instrument.
sentences.chinese: 铜管乐器家族中任何一种像喇叭带有筏的乐器。

sentences.english: Jazz's brass instruments are often played alongside drums and stringed instruments.
sentences.chinese: 爵士乐中的铜管乐器通常会和鼓以及弦乐器一起演奏。

sentences.english: Many wind instruments, too, have a very long history .
sentences.chinese: 许多管乐器，同样，有一个非常悠久的历史。

sentences.english: The most common woodwinds are the reed instruments.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的木管乐器是簧片乐器。

sentences.english: The oboe is a double reed wind instrument.
sentences.chinese: 双簧管是一个具有两片簧片的管乐器。

sentences.english: He plays in the brass of the orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 他在管弦乐团里演奏铜管乐器。
小喇叭和号角都是铜管乐器。

sentences.english: There are also early brass and keyboard instruments.
sentences.chinese: 这里还有早期的铜管乐器和键盘乐器。

definition: plucked string or stringed instrument/plucked instrument
double reed wind instrument (such as oboe or bassoon)
ocarina/wind instrument consisting of an egg-shaped chamber with holes
